edu.iu.dsc.tws.api.comms

Interface SingularReceiver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BAllReduceExample.FinalSingularReceiver, BReduceExample.FinalSingularReceiver, BroadcastStreamingOperation.BcastReceiver, DirectStreamingOperation.DirectReceiver, PartitionStreamingOperation.PartitionBulkReceiver, PipeBatchOperation.PartitionReceiver, ReduceBatchOperation.FinalSingularReceiver, SAllReduceExample.FinalSingularReceiver, SBroadcastExample.BCastReceiver, SDirectExample.PartitionReceiver, SKeyedPartitionExample.PartitionReceiver, SKeyedReduceExample.FinalSingularReceiver, SPartitionExample.PartitionReceiver, SReduceExample.FinalSingularReceiver, SVMCommsReducer.FinalSingularReceiver, WordAggregate

    public interface SingularReceiver
    Interface for receiving a single value. If the value is received successfully, it should return true. This interface will be called multiple times with the same message until it returns true.

    • Method Summary
